component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
verticalSeparator false java.lang.Boolean false When true, a vertical separator is displayed in between the left and right panels.
splitThreshold false java.lang.Integer 800 Minimum pixel width above which both sides of the split view are simultaneously displayed.
leftWidth false java.lang.Integer 30 Percentage of the full view occupied by the left split pane.
splitPadding false java.lang.Integer 5 Number of pixels separating the right and left panes.
rightWidth false java.lang.Integer 70 Percentage of the full view occupied by the right split pane.
onRefresh false java.lang.String Name of a function to call when the split view is refreshed. Passed a single argument which is a string, either 'full' or 'split.'
onPopRight false java.lang.String Name of a function to call when the split view right pane is passed. Passed a single argument which is the div being popped.
exitSplitMode false left java.lang.String When a screen resize exits split mode, show left or right view?
buttonBarSelector false java.lang.String Optional CSS selector for a button bar that has buttons that vary based on which part of the split view is showing.
